column2: Minimum Turnround Time – Trains changing direction at end of journey

For a train to be routed reversibly onto the Up Main the line must be clear to signal ME2029 at Bicester South Jn. Asubsequent train cannot be routed from Bicester South Jn onto the Up Main until the line is clear throughout toPrinces Risborough.A train is unable to leave Aylesbury towards Princes Risborough if a train is shunting between the bay platformand platform 2 and vice versa.
